articles.author: Orla McCaffrey
articles.title: Bank of America Profit Falls 32% - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The second-largest U.S. bank earned $6.2 billion in the second quarter, down from $9.2 billion a year earlier. Per-share earnings of 73 cents missed the 75 cents that analysts had expected.

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: NFL receiver Devon Allen disqualified by 0.001sec in world 110m hurdles final - The Guardian
articles.description: The Americans won nine medals on home turf on Sunday at the world championships, despite a blip in the 110m hurdles final
articles.content:

articles.title: Our world may not make it to 2050 - P.M. News
articles.description: In America? The West is running out of water. Lake Mead and Shasta Lake are running dry. They’re projected to hit the breaking point in 2025.
articles.content:
By Umair Haque
Theres a brutal truth that I think were all going to have to contend with. Take a look out there at the world. How do you think things are going?
